# R Bootcamp for Scientific Computing 2023

![](../fig/hex-stickers.png){width=600}

## What

Each year, volunteers from the Department of Population and Public Health Sciences offer "**The R Bootcamp**." This year, we are excited to be back to hosting this event in person. The Bootcamp consists of three lectures and will provide a general overview of the R programming language.

## When

The event consists of three lectures:

|    | Day | 
|:-------|:---|
| **Lecture 1: Introduction to R and data viz** | Tuesday, August 15 | 
| **Lecture 2: Data wrangling with R** | Wednesday, August 16 |
| **Lecture 3: Automatic Reports with Quarto** | Thursday, August 17 |

All sessions will be held in **SSB 114** (and on Zoom) between **1 PM and 2 PM**.
The [**Zoom meeting**](https://usc.zoom.us/j/94981155347) is password-protected and password will be provided with RSVP.
